title: Coimba protocol: Vitamin D high-dose therapy stops autoimmune diseases
description: High-dose Vitamin D therapy stops autoimmune diseases! With our projects we make the orthomolecular therapy "Coimbra Protocol" available to patients, doctors and the public. May many people benefit from it!
cleaned_text: Together with you we want to make the world a better place, for that we need a web browser that supports current web technology. Unfortunately, your browser is rather old and can't display betterplace.org properly. It's easy to update: Please visit browsehappy.com and choose one of the modern browsers that are showcased there.
